Package com.example.calculator

Class calculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.calculator.calculator
  • public class calculator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a calculator object that can use different operations like: Addition using add(sum1, sum2), multiplication using multiply(sum1, sum2), subtraction using subtract(sum1, sum2) and division using divide(sum1, sum2).
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Aditya Kandel, Omar Abotahoon, Omar Aly, Raj Badial, Ak Au

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      calculator()
      Instantiates a new Calculator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String add​(java.lang.String sum1, java.lang.String sum2)
      Takes in 2 strings, converts them to doubles and computes their sum by adding them.
      java.lang.String calculate​(java.lang.String sum1, java.lang.String operation, java.lang.String sum2)
      Used to call the operand methods that perform computations of sum1 and sum2.
      java.lang.String divide​(java.lang.String sum1, java.lang.String sum2)
      Takes in 2 strings, converts them to doubles and computes their quotient by dividing them.
      java.lang.String multiply​(java.lang.String sum1, java.lang.String sum2)
      Takes in 2 strings, converts them to doubles and computes their product by multiplying them.
      java.lang.String subtract​(java.lang.String sum1, java.lang.String sum2)
      Takes in 2 strings, converts them to doubles and computes their difference by subtracting sum2 from sum1.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public java.lang.String add​(java.lang.String sum1,
                            java.lang.String sum2)
        Takes in 2 strings, converts them to doubles and computes their sum by adding them. Add sum1 and sum2 and return the value
        Parameters:
        sum1 - the first value
        sum2 - the second value
        Returns:
        A String representing the sum of sum1 and sum2

        sum2 - the second value
        Returns:
        A String representing the product of sum1 and sum2

      • subtract

        public java.lang.String subtract​(java.lang.String sum1,
                                 java.lang.String sum2)
        Takes in 2 strings, converts them to doubles and computes their difference by subtracting sum2 from sum1. Subtract sum1 and sum2 and return the value
        Parameters:
        sum1 - the first value
        sum2 - the second value
        Returns:
        A String representing the difference of sum1 and sum2

        Parameters:

        sum2 - the second value
        Returns:
        A String representing the quotient of sum1 and sum2

      • calculate

        public java.lang.String calculate​(java.lang.String sum1,
                                  java.lang.String operation,
                                  java.lang.String sum2)
        Used to call the operand methods that perform computations of sum1 and sum2.
        Parameters:
        sum1 - the first value entered by user
        operation - the operation to perform
        sum2 - the second value entered by user
        Returns:
        A String representing the result of the operation performed on sum1 and sum2
